text.content: Congratulations on your acceptance to HackGT! We are incredibly excited to welcome you to Wonderland this October. As you fill out this form, please note that check-in will begin at approximately 5:30pm on Friday, October 25th and closing ceremonies will end at approximately 2:00pm on Sunday, October 27th.
Valid receipts must have a proof of payment and must be round trip tickets to Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport.

I authorize you to share my application/registration information for event administration, ranking, MLH administration, pre- and post-event informational e-mails, and occasional messages about hackathons in-line with the [MLH Privacy Policy](https://mlh.io/privacy). I further agree to the terms of both the [MLH Contest Terms and Conditions](https://github.com/MLH/mlh-policies/tree/master/prize-terms-and-conditions) and the [MLH Privacy Policy](https://mlh.io/privacy).

text.content: Due to institute policy, minors (under 18) that are not students at Georgia Tech may not attend HackGT.

Responsibilities may include being assigned to a major role during the event, leading other volunteers, providing communication between teams of volunteers, other volunteer leaders, and organizers, and will require more time commitment- including attending a training session prior to the event and being present at the event for a significant period of time.

Responsibilities may include venue setup/teardown, working the Registration desk, food setup/clean up, working the Help and Hardware desk. The time commitment includes attending a training session prior to event and being present during peak hours.

As a volunteer, we need you to be able to commit at least 4 hours each day out of the 3 day event. You will be helping out with a variety of activities like serving food, checking people in, directing crowds, helping with mini events etc. We will have a detailed sign up of roles/shifts closer to the date.
